com.threerings.gwt.tools
Class I18nSyncTask

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.Task
          com.threerings.gwt.tools.I18nSyncTask

public class I18nSyncTask
extends Task

An Ant task to automatically generate FooMessages.java classes from FooMessages.properties classes for GWT's i18n. Configure the Ant task thusly: 

<taskdef name="i18nsync" classname="com.threerings.gwt.tools.I18nSyncTask"
          classpathref="somewhere/gwt-utils.jar"/>
 <i18nsync srcdir="${src.dir}">
   <fileset dir="${src.dir}" includes="**/*Messages.properties"/>
 <i18nsync>
